description: This file contains SQL statements to create the 'mib_definitions' table, its indexes, and row-level security policies for access control.

methods.name: mib_definitions_read_all
methods.description: Policy allowing all authenticated users to read from mib_definitions.

methods.name: mib_definitions_admin_write
methods.description: Policy restricting modifications to admins only.

calls: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.role_id = r.id WHERE u.id = ... AND r.name = 'admin')
